io.github.bananapuncher714.radioboard.providers

Class ImageProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.bananapuncher714.radioboard.providers.ImageProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapDisplayProvider

    public class ImageProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements MapDisplayProvider
    Simple image provider for MapDisplay; will show an image with the given height and width Also allows simple dot drawing with left and right click.
    Author:
    BananaPuncher714
